NoticeData.Contents: World Boss Reward Improvements - After the end of the World Boss season, rewards based on ranking will now include Golden Dust and AP Potions. - Players who rank from 1 to 100 will receive Golden Dust and AP Potions in addition to the existing Rune Shards and Crystals, based on their ranking group. - Detailed quantities can be checked in the World Boss - Rewards tab in the game. - The reward runes for the World Bosses Fenrir and Jerminir will be replaced with new ones. - The old runes can still be obtained through Summon - Rune Summon and can be traded via the shop on the PC version. - The new runes consist of Legendary skill runes and Unique, Epic stat runes. - In the future, we plan to continue replacing reward runes through seasonal updates to maintain the content's value, in collaboration with the community. World Boss Rune Replacement and First Clear Reward Enhancements - Three Adventure Boss reward runes have been replaced. - The previous CRI, HIT, and SPD runes have been swapped with HP, ATK, and DEF runes. - HP runes can be obtained as operational rewards, while ATK and DEF runes are acquired as battle rewards. - The existing Rune Shards can still be traded via the shop on the PC version. - We aim to continue maintaining the content's value through seasonal updates and rune replacements in collaboration with the community. - Enhanced First Clear Rewards for Adventure Bosses - Rewards for each floor have been changed from HIT and SPD runes to ATK and DEF runes. - The number of hammers rewarded per floor has increased by 50-100%. New Rune Added to Monster Collection (Thor - Golden Seed Rune) - A new reward, the Thor - Golden Seed Rune, has been added to Monster Collection. - Available for players with a staking amount of 5,000 or more. - This divine-grade stat rune will be particularly beneficial for those conducting NCG staking. - Enhanced Migration Guidance - New rewards have been added, allowing you to obtain the new Rune Shards after migrating Monster Collection. - To address previous instances of insufficient migration guidance, the instructions have been significantly improved. - When migration is possible, a popup will appear in the game's staking menu to guide you through the process. - Upon migration, rewards will be provided according to the latest reward table. - Please note that migration will reset the starting point for calculating reward intervals and contract modification intervals. Pet Balance Adjustments and Eight New Variation Pets Added - Pet Balance Adjustments - The performance of four existing pets (Black Cat, Red Donguri, Valkyrie, Little Fenrir) has been improved. - Depending on the pet's type and level, their abilities have been enhanced by 20-80%. - Eight New Pets Added - Eight new pets with appearances similar to existing pets have been added. - With the upgrade from 4 to 8 crafting slots, we hope you enjoy crafting with a variety of pets. - The UI for using pets during crafting has been updated to accommodate the new additions. - The new pets can be unlocked and enhanced using the same soul stones as existing pets. Collection Balance Adjustments and New Additions - To enhance the value of the collection system, new collections with lower entry barriers (such as 0 enhancement equipment, summons, and new foods) have been added, along with improved rewards for existing collections. - 73 New Collections Added - 35 new collections for zero-enhancement equipment (without skills) from Worlds 1-7 have been added. - 36 new collections for Grimoire equipment have been added. - 2 new collections for Golden Steak food have been added. - Balance Adjustments for 44 Existing Collections - Rewards for 35 collections for zero-enhancement equipment (with skills) from Worlds 1-7 have been significantly increased. - Rewards for 9 collections for AP Potions, Hourglasses, and Silver Dust have been greatly improved. - Collection Sorting Order Changed - To make it easier to check ongoing collections, completed collections are now sorted to the bottom. - Newly added collections will appear at the top for easier checking. November Season Pass - The "Collection Master Pass" commemorating the November collection overhaul begins. - Earn the "Collection Master" title through this season pass. November Event - Throughout November, various rewards will be added to patrol rewards to help you continue enjoying your adventures. Game Improvements - Fixed an issue in the mobile version where background app sounds would stop unexpectedly.

Custom Equipment Crafting System Added - A new custom equipment system that uses new materials, Scrolls and Circles, has been added. - This menu unlocks after clearing Stage 301. - You can craft three types of items: Weapons, Necklaces, and Rings. - You can choose your desired appearance from a variety of options, and each time, the stats and skills will be randomly generated. - Every time you craft, your relationship will increase by 1. As your relationship increases, you’ll be able to craft equipment with more diverse appearances and stronger stats. - Materials Acquisition - Scrolls can be obtained through Monster Collection item rewards and custom equipment grinding. - Circles can be obtained from Adventure Boss, World Boss rewards, and custom equipment grinding. - For more details, check the Medium announcement. Monster Collection Rewards Added - A new material, Scrolls, for custom equipment crafting has been added to the Monster Collection rewards. - Available from the 500 NCG range and above. - To receive this reward, you need to migrate to the new Monster Collection contract. October Event - Throughout October, various rewards will be added to patrol rewards to help you enjoy more adventurous gameplay. - To support growth through equipment crafting, the block cost required for world equipment crafting will be reduced by 20% throughout October. - For more details, check the Medium announcement. October Season Pass - The Halloween-themed "Hallowinners Pass" will begin in October. - You can get the Hallowinners title through this season pass. - For more details, check the Medium announcement. Game Improvements - Grinding System Improvement - When grinding equipment, additional material items will now drop alongside Crystals. - Crafting Slot Expansion - You can now open up to 4 additional crafting slots using NCG, Crystals, Golden Dust, or Ruby Dust. - Batch Craft Completion - A new feature has been added that allows you to complete all currently crafting slots at once using Hourglasses. - Adventure Boss Improvement - As mentioned in NCIP - 21, adventure bosses for each season will be improved to prevent the selection of bosses that appeared in the previous two rotations. - Armor Icon Change - The avatar armor icons and the equipment armor icons have been separated for better distinction. - Collection Addition - One new title from the Season Pass rewards has been added. - PC Version Shop Improvement - The default sorting criteria for each category has been updated. Bug Fixes - Fixed a bug where the result screen would freeze and not appear after completing event dungeons due to quest processing.

World Boss Improvements - We are preparing long-term improvements for the World Boss system. The details of these changes will be decided and implemented in collaboration with the community through NCIP. Please stay tuned. - Ahead of these long-term adjustments, we have made short-term changes to enhance the World Boss specs and adjust the percentage of players who can achieve the highest rank. - The stat balance of the 6 Runes (3 Fenrir, 3 Saehrimnir) from the World Boss has been adjusted. Only the stats have been increased, with no changes to skill effects. September Event - The returning Crystal Equipment Event will allow you to embark on your adventures with more crystals than before. - Additionally, throughout September, the Patrol Reward System will offer various rewards to help you continue your exciting adventures. - Detailed information can be found in the Medium announcement. September Season Pass - The Odin’s Treasure Pass, celebrating new Odin-related content in September, will begin. - You can earn the "Odin’s Warrior" title through this Season Pass. - Detailed information can be found in the Medium announcement. Game Improvements - Collection Additions - Added collections for 2 title rewards and 4 costumes from previous Season Passes. - Added a collection for 3 food items from the CITRUS CARNIVAL event dungeon. - Adventure Boss Improvements - Fixed an issue where the reward list for the Adventure Boss challenge and rush was not fully displayed. - Adjusted so that the icon will not be displayed if the NCG reward is 0 or below. - Mobile QR Backup Improvement - Improved the export process by increasing the image size for better recognition. - Fixed an issue where the package name of mobile items purchased on different platforms was not displayed correctly in the mail. Bug Fixes - Fixed a bug where the client displayed results differently from the actual clear results when challenging Adventure Boss. - Fixed a bug where the background would shift up or down during battle simulations.
